attributes.action: insist that the Weighbridge pub landlord put our souvenir rack back in its rightful place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following a recent redecoration at the Weighbridge public house in Alvechurch our shelf, containing many mementoes of patrons old and new and the remains of many a happy Christmas meal, was moved from "our" wall and placed on the opposite wall causing some mild distress to regulars. We would like to have it put back to where it has been since time immemorial.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
